page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: The field work and research which have been involved in producing the statistical data and information for this area was carried out by the boys and girls of Class 8(1985) of Burton Upon Stather County Primary School, Burton Upon Stather, Scunthorpe-Ruth, Katy,Catherine,Beverley,Nicky,Hannah,H elen,Marc,Melanie,Julie,Matthew F.,Michelle H.,Paul,Stephen,James,Ben, Mark J.,Katie,Genghis,Phillip,Michelle R.,Tina,Kevin,Nicholas,Victoria,David, Maria,Rachel,Andrew,Mark W.,Matthew W. Jonathan,Mandy,Rachel and Heidi. This project was part of their curriculum during their last summer term at this school.In their work the children were helped by members of the Women's Institute-Mrs Chivers,Mrs Clark,Mrs Hunter,Mrs Ashton,Mrs North and Mrs Hitchin,and by parents-Mrs Foster,Mrs Porter and Mr Hope.
